title: WTB low grade/beater Cobb bat off
author: yoyot1

posts.post_title: WTB low grade/beater Cobb bat off
posts.post_content: Haven't bought a T206 card in years but figured I should at least try and get the last card need for the 518 set.  Definitely looking low grade/beater.  Send me a message if you have one you are willing to part with.
